install.name: Azrul Videobot
install.author: Azrul
install.description:
Embed Video players into Myblog.

  1. Set preferred width & height in parameters settings.
  2. To insert a video [video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxxxxxx]

Supported links: youtube, google, vimeo, metacafe, jumpcut, vidiac, streetfire, stickam
